utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hi, you guys.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hi!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What’s the matter?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Well it’s just—it’s one of those situations that I just hate. Y’know? A massage client gave me three tickets to the Helmet-Pelts exhibit at the Morgan Chase museum.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Now you’re thinking you gotta sleep with him.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: No! No! It’s just that he gave me three tickets and there are six of us!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I’ll give up my ticket.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Me too.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay that’s so generous!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: And I think Ross is generous too.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Great! Okay then it’s just us girls!

utterance.speaker: Monica and Rachel
utterance.content: Great.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: So what-what is the exhibit.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: It’s mostly just photographs of lesbian love scenes interspersed with video games and free sandwiches.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh man!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hi!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey Ross listen Chandler got you out of going to the lesbian sandwich museum this weekend!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Thanks? But I have plans; Elizabeth and I are going out of town.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh that’s great!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I mean think about all the money that you’re gonna make!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Why? What?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Well, her father pays you for baby-sitting right?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No, no, that’s funny. But maybe it’s time to move on, let it go, y’know? Stop it! Besides, Rachel is going out with Elizabeth’s father, so ah, he’s much older than she is. Looks like I’m not the only one interested in fossils, huh?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I mean Ross all that does is remind us that you are interested in fossils.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Okay, okay. Uh, well uh, Rachel is going to need to yell sweet nothings in his ear.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Ross.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh, come on you guys; that’s funny! Y’know? Because he’s need—he’s got like a hearing aide y’know, ‘cause-‘cause y’know, ‘cause he’s all old, and…

utterance.speaker: Paul
utterance.content: Okay look, Ross, just so you know that since Lizzie likes you so much, I’ve decided to accept the fact that you’re going out with her.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Really? That okay, that’s great.

utterance.speaker: Paul
utterance.content: Yeah. But then I changed my mind. I’m funny like that. So I told Lizzie, now I’m telling you, I don’t want you seeing my daughter anymore.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: All right look, I-I realize it upsets you.

utterance.speaker: Paul
utterance.content: Yes it does.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: But, Elizabeth and I are-are both adults and so I don’t think there’s really anything you can do about it.

utterance.speaker: Paul
utterance.content: I’ll call the university and tell them about your relationship and have you fired.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Ohh! A man with a plan!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, this is so exciting! You get your picture back up on the wall of fame! Eek!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I know. It was so cool when I was up there before. Me and Jim Belushi would just be crackin’ up about something… Then I get fired off of Days Of Our Lives and he takes me down. Now he’s just laughing at me. Look at him, that smug Belushi bastard, I’ll…

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Ohh, okay maybe they put your picture back up they can put you next to Matt Lauer. Look at him, smiling at me. Yeah I know; we’d be great together!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey! So I’m back.

utterance.speaker: The Dry Cleaner
utterance.content: Who are you?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Joey Tribbiani! From the wall! Okay, maybe this will jog your memory, huh? Huh? Okay eh-ah-anyway, I’m ready to go back up on the wall I’m the star of a new TV show.

utterance.speaker: The Dry Cleaner
utterance.content: Show me in the table.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh well, it’s not on TV yet.

utterance.speaker: The Dry Cleaner
utterance.content: Well, then it’s not on the wall yet.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Okay, fine, I will bring you a tape, huh?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: So umm, now do you have any of Matt Lauer’s clothes here? Maybe? Just ones that haven’t been cleaned yet?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh, I love museums!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Umm.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Soakin’ up all the culture.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Where do you want to start?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ooh, the gift shop!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yeah!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hey, and then lunch.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, wait yes, but I can’t eat too much. Paul is taking me out to dinner tonight, he said he has a big surprise planned.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh wow. What, do you think maybe he’s gonna tell you that he’s gay?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What?! No! Why?!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: No reason! That would just be a really big surprise, right?

utterance.speaker: The Museum Official
utterance.content: You can put the aisle over here , and put the wedding ceremony right over here.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I didn’t know you could get married here.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: This would be a beautiful place to get married, yeah, but I wouldn’t put the aisle there and I would never have the ceremony there! I mean you’d have the ceremony under this big beautiful arch.

utterance.speaker: The Museum Official
utterance.content: May I help you?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh sorry didn’t mean to interrupt. It’s just such a beautiful space; do you do a lot of weddings here?

utterance.speaker: The Museum Official
utterance.content: Yes. We’re very popular. There’s a two-year waiting list. Sorry!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Monica, you should totally put your name down on the list

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What?! Are you crazy?! I’m not getting married! I’m not even engaged.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah, but there’s a two-year wait. And then what if you get engaged in two years and then you got to wait another two years for this place. That’s four years. Chandler’s not gonna wait that long. He’s gonna find somebody else, y’know? Someone, someone who did put their name on the list.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah hon, it can’t hurt to put your name down! I mean in if two years if you’re not engaged you just don’t use it.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Well, I mean I guess there is no harm in putting my name down.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I’m gonna do it too!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Me too!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Really? Who would, who would you marry?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I don’t know, I don’t have anyone right now. Y’know?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh Pheebs.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Don’t feel too sorry for me. At least my boyfriend isn’t gay.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Phoebe, that stuff is…

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Don’t even get me started on yours!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey! So, did you watch the tape of my show?

utterance.speaker: The Dry Cleaner
utterance.content: I did.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: All right, let’s get me back up there!

utterance.speaker: The Dry Cleaner
utterance.content: No! It don’t go up on the wall!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: What—But you saw the show!

utterance.speaker: The Dry Cleaner
utterance.content: Yes, it was very offensive to my people!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Dry cleaners?

utterance.speaker: The Dry Cleaner
utterance.content: Russians! It showed them as terrorists and villains!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Okay! Okay, look! You-you-you got Harrison Ford up there!

utterance.speaker: The Dry Cleaner
utterance.content: That’s right. Mr. Ford is a very good customer, he brings us a lot of clothes; you bring us nothing!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Okay well that may be true. But, in-in okay, Air Force One the Russians were terrorists! And evil! And plus he kills a bunch of them! That-that-that’s offensive to Russians.

utterance.speaker: The Dry Cleaner
utterance.content: I’ve never seen it!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh you should, it’s great.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: This place is really beautiful!

utterance.speaker: Elizabeth
utterance.content: Yeah, I’ve been coming here since I was a kid. This used to be my Grandma’s.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Wow! The only thing I got from my Grandmother was her eyes. I mean not-not her actual eyeballs, but, but people say that my eyes—Do-do you want to make out?

utterance.speaker: Elizabeth
utterance.content: Sure!

utterance.speaker: Elizabeth
utterance.content: Are you okay? What’s wrong?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Ehh, I was just, I was just thinking about your father.

utterance.speaker: Elizabeth
utterance.content: Well, whatever works for ya…

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No. No-no uh, he just, he just really freaked me out before.

utterance.speaker: Elizabeth
utterance.content: Oh. Well, so we have to hide our relationship from one more person. Big deal. Besides, it’s kinda fun hiding.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Elizabeth
utterance.content: Hey umm, you brought protection right?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Why?! Are there like bears or something?! Ohh. Oh, protection. Yeah-no, yeah-no, that-that-that I forgot.

utterance.speaker: Elizabeth
utterance.content: I’ll just run to the store and get some.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh no! Hey-hey, I’m the guy! I’ll get it.

utterance.speaker: Elizabeth
utterance.content: Do you know where the store is?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No.

utterance.speaker: Elizabeth
utterance.content: Do you want to ride around town on my little pink bicycle?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: A little bit.

utterance.speaker: Elizabeth
utterance.content: I’ll be back in ten minutes.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Elizabeth
utterance.content: Why don’t you get in the hot tub and I’ll meet you there.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Ohh, okay.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh my God, what a great surprise! This is such a beautiful house.

utterance.speaker: Paul
utterance.content: Thank you, it’s my mom’s. So this is the kitchen.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: You’ve reached Monica and Chandler’s, if you’re listening to this message, we’re probably screening. Yeah we are.

utterance.speaker: The Museum Official
utterance.content: Hi, this is Heldi from the Morgan Chase museum. I’m calling for Monica Geller. I want to let her know that there was a cancellation and if she’s still interested in having the Bing-Geller wedding at our facility, it is available…

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: This is Chandler Bing! This is Chandler Bing! Yes, the groom—No! Not the groom!!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: It’s so secluded up here.

utterance.speaker: Paul
utterance.content: I know. I like it up here.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I feel like we’re the only two people in the world. Oops. Sorry.

utterance.speaker: Paul
utterance.content: What’s the matter honey? Did you see a little mouse?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No-no! Big bear! Big bear outside! I think I-I—would you—actually, would you go check on that?

utterance.speaker: Paul
utterance.content: Honey, we don’t have any bears here.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well, okay. Would-would you get me a Diet Coke?

utterance.speaker: Paul
utterance.content: Okay. I’ll be right back.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay. What?! What are you doing here?!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What are you doing here?!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I came with Paul!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah, I recognize the ankles!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Get up!

utterance.speaker: Paul
utterance.content: Here you go honey!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ahh. Thank you!

utterance.speaker: Paul
utterance.content: Diet Coke.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Op, ice. I need ice.

utterance.speaker: Paul
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Thank you.

utterance.speaker: Paul
utterance.content: I’ll be right back.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: You and your ice.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ugh! Get out! Get out! Go! Come on! No! Not in there! He’s in there!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Did you really hear a bear?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Go-go!

utterance.speaker: Paul
utterance.content: Here you go honey. One Diet Coke with ice.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ohh, thank you.

utterance.speaker: Paul
utterance.content: I’m so happy that you’re here.

utterance.speaker: Elizabeth
utterance.content: Here I am!

utterance.speaker: Paul
utterance.content: Elizabeth! Oh look, Elizabeth’s here! Who are you talking to?

utterance.speaker: Elizabeth
utterance.content: Uh, you guys?

utterance.speaker: Paul
utterance.content: How did you know we were here?

utterance.speaker: Elizabeth
utterance.content: Umm…

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well, she-she ob-obviously saw the tire tracks that were leading up to the closed garage.

utterance.speaker: Elizabeth
utterance.content: Obviously.

utterance.speaker: Paul
utterance.content: Elizabeth, what are you doing here?!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Did-did you come up here to work on that term paper or something?

utterance.speaker: Elizabeth
utterance.content: Yeah! Yep.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well, why do y’know go in that room and do your homework?

utterance.speaker: Elizabeth
utterance.content: Ohh, I wouldn’t do it in there. That’s my dad’s bedroom.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: That’s your, that’s your dad’s bedroom. That’s your dad’s bedroom!

utterance.speaker: Paul
utterance.content: Why are you yelling?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Whoa, that Diet Coke just went straight to my head! Woo!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hi, honey.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: See you later.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What? I-I bought groceries, I was gonna make you dinner!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well next time ask! Or at least wait for me to ask!

utterance.speaker: The Museum Official
utterance.content: Hi, this is Heldi from the Morgan Chase museum. I’m calling for Monica Geller.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh no!

utterance.speaker: The Museum Official
utterance.content: I want to let her know that there was a cancellation and if she’s still interested in having the Bing-Geller wedding at our facility, it is available…

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh please, he didn’t hear it! He didn’t hear it!!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: This is Chandler Bing! This is Chandler Bing!

utterance.speaker: Female Clerk
utterance.content: Can I help you?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Uh yeah, where-where’s the guy who decides who’s pictures go up on the wall?

utterance.speaker: Female Clerk
utterance.content: He’s not here right now.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh, you’re kidding me! All-all right, well make sure you tell him that Joey Tribbiani stopped by to drop off all of these clothes. Okay? I’m an actor; I’m kinda getting my picture up there on the wall.

utterance.speaker: Female Clerk
utterance.content: Y’know, there are two people who could put your picture up there.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh really? Well, maybe you and I go out for drinks? You’re the other one right?

utterance.speaker: Paul
utterance.content: So Lizzie, are-are-are you planning on staying the night?

utterance.speaker: Elizabeth
utterance.content: Oh no-no believe me, I’m leaving as soon as possible!

utterance.speaker: Paul
utterance.content: Good. Good. Not that we don’t want you to stay, obviously you’re welcome—How much more homework do you have?

utterance.speaker: Elizabeth
utterance.content: Ahh, I just have one problem left that I do not know how to solve. Uhh, Rachel maybe you want to come upstairs and help me figure it out?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Really? Okay. Okay, I-I’ll go upstairs. If-if you get me something from the car.

utterance.speaker: Paul
utterance.content: What do you need from the car?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Surprise me.

utterance.speaker: Paul
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: So you’re gonna be in the car, I will be upstairs, and that’s where everybody’s gonna be!

utterance.speaker: Paul
utterance.content: Just relax. Just relax Paul, you’re doing great. She likes you. She… Maybe, she likes you. She likes you. Y’know why? Because you’re a neat guy. You are the man. You are the man! I still got it. Nice and sexy. You’re just a love machine. I’m just a love machine and I won’t work for nobody but you! Hey bab-y! Showtime. I’m just a love machine, yeah ba-by!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Phoebe!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Have you seen Chandler?!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: No! Why?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: The woman from the museum called and said that there was a cancellation and that we could move up our wedding and Chandler heard! I know! How bad is this?!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Well for the regular guy, it’s bad, but Chandler, Oh dear God!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I know! I know! And he totally freaked out and I can’t find him anywhere!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: What are you gonna do?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Well, I’m never gonna listen to you again, that’s for sure! "Y’know, harm can it do if you go and put your name down?"

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Rachel said that!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Well Rachel’s not here!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh! Here it is! Ooh, Joey! Why did you sign it, "Son of a bitch?"

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I didn’t do that! Who would’ve done that?!

utterance.speaker: The Dry Cleaner
utterance.content: Son of a bitch!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay, maybe ask this guy.

utterance.speaker: The Dry Cleaner
utterance.content: You, get out of my shop!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Well, what did he do?

utterance.speaker: The Dry Cleaner
utterance.content: He went out with my wife!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Joey!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Whoa-whoa-whoa-whoa, I-I—Hey! I did not go out with your wife! Okay? I went out with her!

utterance.speaker: The Dry Cleaner
utterance.content: That’s my wife!!! Get out!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Well, we should go.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Elizabeth
utterance.content: Ross? Ross?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Elizabeth! Okay. Okay. I’m gonna go out this window. I’ll meet you at the front door. Just tell them you’re going home, okay?

utterance.speaker: Elizabeth
utterance.content: Okay!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh wait-wait-wait!! No! Don’t go in there! Don’t go in there! I need another soda!

utterance.speaker: Paul
utterance.content: Ross!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh my God Ross! What in heaven’s name are you doing here?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: And that is why we cannot see each other anymore.

utterance.speaker: Paul
utterance.content: Ross. You and I are going to have to have a little talk.

utterance.speaker: Elizabeth
utterance.content: Daddy!

utterance.speaker: Paul
utterance.content: You’re next!!

utterance.speaker: Elizabeth
utterance.content: Okay. I didn’t know he was here.

utterance.speaker: Paul
utterance.content: Let me just see if I got this straight. I tell you to stay away from my daughter or I’ll have you fired. What you heard was, "Take my daughter, come up to my country house, and ruin my weekend with Rachel!"

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Okay, please-please Paul, just let me explain…

utterance.speaker: Paul
utterance.content: No, let me explain! Fired!!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: All right, fine! Fine! Have me fired! But uh, I want you to know that you and I are not all that different. I mean, I too am a neat guy.

utterance.speaker: Paul
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: And I too am just a love machine.

utterance.speaker: Paul
utterance.content: Ross, let me show you where the guest room is.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I’m so sorry. Please, stop freaking out.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I’m not freaking out. Why would I be freaking out? A woman named Heldi called and said we were getting married, but that happens everyday.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Honey, we were at this beautiful place, and I-I-I just put our names down for fun! I mean, what’s the harm in that?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Right here!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Chandler, please don’t think I was trying to pressure you. Phoebe and Rachel…

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Phoebe and Rachel! So the people that knew about our wedding before me were you, Phoebe and Rachel, Heldi, and apparently some band called Starlight Magic 7 who are available by the way!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: It was a mistake. Please don’t take this to mean anything, because it doesn’t.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Really?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yes, if it really doesn’t mean anything, because you know that I’m just not ready…

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I know! I know.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I’m gonna go tell Joey that that you’re back. I was really worried about you.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hey, did she buy it?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Totally.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: So did Heldi show you the place?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah, it’s beautiful.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I can’t believe you’re gonna ask Monica to marry you!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I know.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey Gunther.

utterance.speaker: Gunther
utterance.content: Hey! Take these cappuccinos to table 11 and that guy over there wants the biscotti.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh uh, well I just came in for a cup of coffee to go.

utterance.speaker: Gunther
utterance.content: Do you still work here?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: No! No, I quit a long time ago. Did I forget to you that one? I’m sorry.

utterance.speaker: Gunther
utterance.content: Oh that’s cool, I was gonna fire you anyway.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Great!
